name: Lambo's Tale
description:
Lambo’s Tale is a 2D platformer implementing Metroidvania mechanics.

It was created in about four weeks with a team of 4 programmers, 4 designers and 3 artists for our third year final project at ISART Digital.

In this game you will play as Lambo, a little lamb who goes to fight packs of wolves in order to avenge his sister, Lambette.

You will have to go through various levels and collect golden eggs which will allow you to buy new abilities and increase your stats (health, resistance, attack). 

Find the Wolf's Den in each level and defeat all the enemies to learn new attacks! Then find the book to move to the next stage!

Programmers: Julien SOYSOUVANH, Philippe YI, Grégoire PENON, Clément FAZILLEAU
Designers: Max DROULEZ, Adrien BORDES, Grégory RUMEBE, Tony ZHANG
Artists: Jade PERDRILLAT, Mélanie L'HUILLIER, Salomé LYSIMAQUE CHAPUIS
